resources.string: ArtMind is meant to be a quick snapshot of your mental health. If your results indicate you may be experiencing symptoms of a mental illness, consider sharing your results with someone (such as a doctor or a therapist).

Respect the privacy of others. Do not take screenshots or share any content without explicit consent. Everyone has the right to control the visibility of their creations and maintain a sense of security within the community.
Your privacy matters to us. Rest assured that the data uploaded will not be utilized for any research purposes. We are committed to maintaining the confidentiality of your information.
Using this app implies your agreement to follow our guidelines, fostering an ethical environment for everyone. Your adherence contributes to the well-being of the entire community.

The goal of ArtMind is to enhance individuals\' self-awareness regarding their mental well-being, fostering a deeper understanding of their emotional states. It is not only designed for individuals but also for parents or educators. By identifying their mental state through creative expression, individuals can make informed decisions and access support from mental health centre through ArtMind.
Click image to change profile pic
No help centre(s) found for selected country
Username should be of length 3 to 10
Focus on your drawing to ease your mind of anxieties with the help of this timer!
Congratulations, you have focused for 10 mins!
Remember: \nThis tool is not a substitute for a diagnostic evaluation by mental health professional. Please refer to the Ethical Guidelines.
